    • Method Detail

      • askToConnectTo

        public void askToConnectTo(BluetoothDevice server)
        Asks the Service to connect to the device (server) passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        server - the device to connect to.

      • askToSendLockUnlockMessage

        public void askToSendLockUnlockMessage()
        Asks the Service to send a lock-unlock Message towards the server.

      • askToSendFingerCalibrationMessage

        public void askToSendFingerCalibrationMessage(Quaternion calibration)
        Asks the Service to send a Finger calibration Message towards the server.
        Parameters:
        calibration - a Quaternion that will be used as the starting orientation for the Finger. This orientation isn't realtive to the user's coordinate system.

      • askToSendCursorClickMessage

        public void askToSendCursorClickMessage()
        Asks the Service to send a click Message towards the server.

      • askToSendOrientationChangedMessage

        public void askToSendOrientationChangedMessage(Quaternion orientationUpdate)
        Asks the Service to send a Finger orientation update Message towards the server.
        Parameters:
        orientationUpdate - a Quaternion representing the new Finger orientation expressed in a coordinate system that is different from the user's coordinate system.

      • askToStopSupplyingOrientationUpdates

        public void askToStopSupplyingOrientationUpdates()
        Asks the Service to transition over its SUPPLYING_COMMANDS state.

      • askToResetCursorPosition

        public void askToResetCursorPosition()
        Asks the Service to send a reset cursor position Message towards the server.
